quote: I don't like making calls, but I still have to make care calls.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of doing necessary tasks even if they are uncomfortable.
suggested_hook: Why doing the hard things can set you apart in real estate.

quote: None of my buyers have lost out in multiple offers this year.
why_clipworthy: Demonstrates effective strategies for winning in competitive markets.
suggested_hook: How to ensure your buyers win in a seller's market.
